charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of one (1) year and one (1) day as to count 1.

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of eight (8) months as to count one (1).
